cast.overview: In 1997, before the visit of the pope to Rio de Janeiro, Captain Nascimento from BOPE (Special Police Operations Battalion) is assigned to eliminate the risks of the drug dealers in a dangerous slum nearby where the pope intends to be lodged.
cast.title: Elite Squad

details.biography: Nathalia Goyannes Dill Orrico (Rio de Janeiro, March 24, 1986), better known as Nathalia Dill is a Brazilian actress. Famous for her diverse characters in various areas of entertainment, she has won several awards, including an Extra Award, and a Young Brazilian Award, in addition to having received nominations for a Guarani Award and two Quality Brazil Awards.
details.name: Nathalia Dill
details.place_of_birth: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
